Catering Min Delivery: 3.00 User Reviews
D&S Market Place Posted by Healthy Bites on 06/10/2011
Fresh and Consistant
Everything I have ordered at D&S has been delicious! Extremely fresh and reasonable with consistently fast and run by polite people. Sandwiches are abundantly full of turkey, avocado, sprouts, tuna fish or whatever you're craving... all inside a couple nice pieces of soft bread. Enjoy! D&S Market Place Posted by Franco on 03/24/2011
Bad
Attention to detail: 0 Ordered 5 sandwiches all the same. They managed to get every one of them wrong. Reordered them and they delivered again the wrong sandwiches. D&S Market Place Posted by vk on 10/27/2010
Best deli lunch fast food in midtown
Number one thing, it's always packed, means the food is fresh and moves. They give you want you want, and delivery is sooo quick. As well, when you are there, they have an amazing great system. From breakfast, to deli sandwiches, to burgers, and steak sandwiches, including their fries are great! And the folks are very friendly. D&S Market Place Posted by frequent luncher on 02/26/2010
best value and quality
The guys working there are always nice. where else can you get a cheeseburger deluxe with fries for 6 bucks. Everything is made fresh and made to order. our office favorites are the Philly cheese steak sandwich and their chicken sandwiches. i just got their spicy tuna salad melt...and i think i will be returning. D&S Market Place Posted by localnyc on 12/29/2009
Excellent Deli!!
The best breakfast and lunch. Everything is always fresh and delicious. D&S Market Place Posted by anonymous tourist on 10/23/2009
Remarkable Deli
This is a fantastic Deli. Compared with other Delis, the food quality is perfect while having an ample choice and the location (including the restroom) is notable. A pity they do not provide dinner but it seems focussing on breakfast/lunch is quite a good idea. D&S Market Place Posted by Arizona Anonymous on 10/22/2009
Best New York City Deli!
What a place. Breakfast was wonderful and the price could not be better. Upstairs dining is great with a view of the street. Coffee was great. Buffet looked yummy.
